title: 15 held over laws violations
content:
SARGODHA, Aug 28 (APP): Sargodha police on Monday launched a crackdown on alleged criminals across the district and arrested 15 people and recovered 2-kg charas, 147 litres of liquor, nine pistols and valuables worth millions of rupees from them.
